page.title: 15FARMING
page.content:
MANOR FARM, KNIGHTS ENHAM
Manor farm is owned by MR.C.HUNT and MR.G.HUNT.They own about a thousand lambs and sheep. They have winter barley,spring barley, peas and wheat. They have 55 beef steers . There are 11 people who work on the farm altogether. There are 158 hectares of grass land for the sheep and cattle. They have just got a new combine, harvester. The combine harvester is used for cutting the wheat, spring barley, winter barley, and oil seed rape. There is 203 hectares of wheat 62 hectares of winter barley,and 114 hectares of spring barley. They also have 31.3 hectares of oil seed rape thats for vegetable oil.
